text: niccayamaka avviruvarum pavattirkuriyavarkalaki vittarkal enru kantu kollappattal, appotu utaimai kitaikka ventum enak koruvorukku nerunkiya uravinar iruvar (mocam ceytuvitta) avviruvarin itattil ninru"avviruvarin catciyattaivita enkalin catciyam mika unmaiyanatu. Nankal varampu miravillai. (Appati miriyiruntal) nankal aniyayakkararkalaki vituvom" enru allahvin mitu cattiyam ceytu kura ventum
